events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this is very disappointing.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized under refund requests due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can process your refund faster?
I have attached the photo of the incorrect item and here is my order number: 987654321. Please let me know how soon the refund will be issued.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and send you a confirmation email within 48 hours. You should see the amount back in your account shortly after.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund process and clear communication.
We have completed processing your refund. Please check your account within a few days and contact us if there are any issues.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now as your refund is confirmed. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
